page.title: 14Food
page.content: My favourite food is lasagne and chips. For my breakfast I have two pieces of toast and some Cocopops. For my dinner I have sandwiches, a packet of crisps and a chocolate biscuit. For my tea I normally have fish and chips cooked in the microwave oven then for pudding I have fruit salad. On Sunday we have roast lamb, potatoes, spring cabbage, carrots and yorkshire pudding, followed by apple pie and cream. In our days we get food from other countries imported into England. From Israel we get oranges and bananas,and peaches come from the USA. I like barbecued ribs,beefburgers tandoori chicken and kebabs with pitta bread,and steak cooked with garlic sauce and onions.We have our barbecues outside in the back garden. By Rebecca Ince, age 10.
